entry.title: Possibility to Insert new column of Vendor Name and CNPJ of receiver in EDOC_COCKPIT for Brazil
entry.content:
Hi everyone!

I recently implemented DRC Inbound for the Brazilian market. I received some questions from users saying that columns are missing in T-code EDOC_COCKPIT, such as Supplier Name and Recipient Name, as well as the Recipient's CNPJ (Corporate Taxpayer ID). The question makes sense, since we had these columns in GRC.

I came here to ask if there is a solution for this situation or if anyone has customized EDOC_COCKPIT.

Thanks in advance

Best regards,

Daniel Tsuji

entry.title: Fixing IGS Connection Issues After SID Change in S/4HANA Migration
entry.content:
When migrating an SAP S/4HANA system and changing the System ID (SID), you might encounter issues with graphical charts in certain transactions. A common example is Transaction DB02, which shows database performance and space statistics.

After migration, executing DB02 may result in :  IGS not available (RC=1), Charts not available

Root Cause
The Internet Graphics Service (IGS) is responsible for rendering charts in SAP GUI. It communicates via an RFC destination named IGS_RFC_DEST. When the SID changes during migration, this RFC destination still points to the old SID, causing the connection to fail.

Symptoms

  • Charts in DB02 are missing.
  • RFC destination IGS_RFC_DEST fails the connection test.
  • Error message: IGS not available (RC=1).

Solution: Update RFC Destination
Step 1: Go to Transaction SM59

Navigate to RFC Destinations.
Search for IGS_RFC_DEST (Type: TCP/IP Connection).

Step 2: Test the Connection

Perform a Connection Test.
It will fail because the program name and gateway details are incorrect.

Step 3: Update the RFC Parameters
Modify the following fields:

  • Program Name: IGS.<SID> (Replace <SID> with your new system ID.)
  • Gateway Host: Set this to the CI (Central Instance) server host of the new SID.
  • Gateway Service: sapgw<nn> (Replace <nn> with the instance number of the CI.)

Step 4: Save and Test Again

Run the Connection Test. It should now succeed.

Step 5: Verify in DB02

Execute DB02 again. Charts should now be visible.

Additional Tips

  • After any SID change, review all RFC destinations in SM59.
  • Check other services like SAP Gateway and IGS to ensure they are running.
  • If you use load-balanced systems, verify the gateway host points to the correct application server.

entry.title: Missing ItemID/DocumentItemText in Confirmation Response of 'JournalEntryCreateRequestConfi'
entry.content:
Hi SAP member,

 

The standard API(JournalEntryCreateRequestConfi' for AR and AP postings) does not return the ItemID/DocumentItemText element in the Confirmation response in S4 HANA Private Cloud. As a result, users are unable to determine which Item ID an error message pertains to.
Is there a way to retrieve ItemID or DocumentItemText in the Confirmation response
 
Thanks.
Regards,
Sravan kumar Nendrambaka

entry.title: Add new co-pa characteristic to acdoca structure in costing based co-pa

not Margin Analysis ,not Combinded.

Do I have to add new co-pa characteristic to acdoca structure by fco_add_copa_field _to_acdoca program. I runned the "fco_add_copa_field_to_acdoca" program. But 
the co-pa characteristic field in acdoca structure is not created. 

If it is necessary to create the co-pa characteristic field to acdoca structure in costing based co-pa.  Please let me know how to create. 

thanks Regards.

entry.title: Batch quantity is not checked during Outbound delivery creation
entry.content:
Hello,

I did the setting for a standard batch delivery creation at outbound delivery.

My point is this one : once I tried to create an outbound delivery, the quantity at batch storage location is not control. Due of that, the full quantity is set up to the batch determined (based on my determination : VFDAT).

On my example :

Product : ABC.

Batch : 100 - Qty 25

Batch : 101 - Qty 25.

Sales Orders : ABC - 26.

=> At the outbound delivery creation,  the batch 100 is picked with the quantity of 26 instead of 25 plus 1 for the batch 101.

Do you have any idea ?

Additional remark, once I used the standard availability check SR (with the aatp activated - we don't activate any paid option / package) for my product it works as expected. However, with an other availability check (where aatp is not activated) I met this behavior (for example : 01).In advance, thanks for you help.

entry.title: Bill Of Exchange - Partial Payment
entry.content:
Dear Expert,

We are using SAP S/4HANA Cloud Private Edition 2023. While posting a F-40 Bill of Exchange with partial payment, we noticed that the Partial Amount field is disabled. In some transactions the field appears editable, but in others it is not.

Please find the screenshot attached for your reference.

Could you please advise if there are any specific configurations or settings required to enable the Partial Amount field consistently?

Thank you for your support.

 

Regards,

silambu

entry.title: In public cloud how to get Sales Order Header Text
entry.content:
How can we read Sales Order Header Text in SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud (clean core, no modification)?

I have tried multiple ways but couldn’t get the header text of a Sales Order.
In Public Cloud:

  • Read_Text is not allowed

  • Table access to STXH/STXL is not allowed

  • CDS view extensibility for reading text via text-object/text-id is not available

  • BAdI access to SD text API is restricted

  • The only relevant released view is I_SALESORDERTP , but this cannot be used inside our custom CDS view.

entry.title: User Visibility Issue in Manage Sales Document App
entry.content:
Issue Description : 

I'm encountering an unusual authorization-related issue in the Manage Sales Document app that affects user visibility in the people picker/recipient selection area.

Symptoms : 

When SAP_ALL profile is assigned:

  • Users appear correctly in the people picker for approval workflows
  • Recipient selection functions as expected

When SAP_ALL profile is removed:

  • Users no longer appear in the people picker
  • Recipient selection area shows no users or limited user visibility

Environment : 

  • SAP S/4HANA Private Cloud 2023
  • Manage Sales Document Fiori app

Questions : 

Which specific authorization objects or roles are required for users to appear in the recipient selection area for sales document approvals?

Is there a specific authorization object that controls visibility in the people picker that might be included in SAP_ALL but missing from standard sales roles?

Request for Help : 

I'm looking for guidance on the minimum authorization requirements needed for users to be visible in the people picker without relying on SAP_ALL. Any insights on relevant authorization objects.

BR

entry.title: Updates on ODATA V2 Deprecation
entry.content:
Dear Community,

I have confusion on latest rumors' on stopping support for ODATA v2 from SAP. I am not really finding any SAP note on that to get clear idea. Can someone help me to get it and also do you have idea on below points?

  • If ODATA v2 support is going to stop then what will happen to old service/integrations done with non-sap systems after system upgrade?
  • Are ODATA services created through SEGW comes under ODATA v2?
  • If creating ODATA services is not recommended in SEGW then how same can be done in v4 version(may be following RAP Model)?(Any blog or documentation on creating READ, UPDATE, CREATE Operations in ODATA v4 same like how we were doing in SEGW?)

Thanks for your time in reading my queries, please drop ur comments.

Regards,

Omkar

entry.title: Budget Availability Control for Projects - S/4HANA Private Cloud
entry.content:
Hi SAP Community,

so I observe the following: Under SAP S/4HANA Private Cloud I cannot use Budget Availability Control for Projects | SAP Help Portal as it is provided under Public Cloud Solution. However, I can use the new Cost Center Budget Control, thats based on ACDOCP.

Does that mean, under Private Cloud solutions, I can only use the old project and order budget availability control thats based on the old BP* tables?

That would entail no Fiori reporting or any other budget control apps like I have it for Cost Centers, right?

Please tell me I'm wrong and that I'm missing something.

Kind regards

Alex

entry.title: Managing Vehicles in SAP Asset Management and SAP SSAM
entry.content:
Dear Colleagues,

I am currently working on a requirement related to vehicle management within SAP S/4HANA Asset Management and SAP Service and Asset Manager (SSAM).

Could you please advise if there are any standard capabilities available for managing vehicles that can be leveraged by technicians in both SAP Asset Management and SSAM?

Regarding SSAM specifically, I reviewed the Features and Personas Configuration Matrix but could not find any relevant features : https://help.sap.com/docs/service-asset-manager/sap-service-and-asset-manager-configuration-guide/features-and-personas-configuration-matrix?locale=en-US

Have you encountered this requirement in previous projects?

Your insights would be greatly appreciated.

Kind regards,

SAP Service and Asset Manager PLM Enterprise Asset Management (EAM)/Plant Maintenance (PM) SAP S/4HANA Cloud Private Edition

entry.title: Get the price for a material without simulating sales order
entry.content: We want to get the price of a material without simulating the sales order via BAPI. Currently we are using BAPI_PIQ_SDPRICELIST  to get the net price of a material but it is simulating the sales order and providing the price which is causing the performance issue. We need it for multiple materials at one go but it is taking longer time. is there anyway we can get the net price directly from the table rather than BAPI.

entry.title: Inspection lot quantity overflow
entry.content:
Hello Team,

Figure -1 shows the entry with QA32. The highlighted area correctly displays a quantity (Qty) of 41,400.

However, when performing Result Recording for that lot, the inspected quantity in the Inspect field only shows 32,767 (see Figure -2).

Sampling is set to 100%. All Master Data is correct.

The issue is as follows: if the quantity is less than 32,767, there is no issue. If the quantity is greater than 32,767, the Inspect field in Figure -2 only shows 32,767.
Can you please explain why this is happening? Any suggestions please.

Thanks & Best Regards,

Nyi Nyi Htway
